revision.text:
<!--영화_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Film
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 제목 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 원제 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 감독 | ontologyProperty = director }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 제작 | ontologyProperty = producer }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 각본 | ontologyProperty = writer }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 해설 | ontologyProperty = narrator }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출연 | ontologyProperty = starring }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 음악 | ontologyProperty = musicComposer }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 촬영 | ontologyProperty = cinematography }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 촬영장소 | ontologyProperty = place }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 편집 | ontologyProperty = editing }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 배급 | ontologyProperty = distributor }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 나라 | ontologyProperty = country }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 제작비 | ontologyProperty = budget | unit = Currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 흥행수익 | ontologyProperty = gross | unit = Currency }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 개봉 | ontologyProperty = releaseDate }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 시간 | ontologyProperty = runtime | unit = Time }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 언어 | ontologyProperty = language }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 원작 | ontologyProperty = basedOn }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 웹사이트 | ontologyProperty = foaf:homepage }}
end}}

 
<!-- Not Yet Mapping
| 촬영카메라 = 
| 촬영필름   =
| 스튜디오 = 
| 등급     = 
| 관객수   = 
| 전편     = 
| 후편     = 
| 평점     = 
-->
